Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: VujaBeograd
Reviews.Content: Good location ! only 5 minutes away from the Istiklal street which is the most beautiful pedestrian zone of Istanbul.Friendly staff,always at your service...It is a good side of Monopol hotel. But nighttime noise,dirty bathroom,bad food for breakfast is the bad side! I even had to ask for another room !I could not sleep because of loud music from the nightclub which is right next to the hotel. If you come to Istanbul to enjoy the nightlife and you dont want to have breakfast in hotel ,this hotel is not so bad choice for you.

Reviews.Title: “Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Carolyn H
Reviews.Content: hotel overpriced 70 Euro for very basic rooms .Went with three other people and all of us had to change rooms due to them being dirty, holes in washbasins,shower with sticking plasters on the doors and windows facing fire escapes . We were moved to rooms with good views but they still needed updating. Bar in reception only served non acholic drinks. Breakfast was okay with a good variety of items. Next time l would look at a smaller boutique hotel It did not spoil my visit as Istanbul was lovely very hilly with great views.

Reviews.Title: “soooooo dirty”
Reviews.Author: elena2811
Reviews.Content: very dirty, the rooms unacceptable and bathroom inside the mold, noisy, rude staff, breakfast very poor, all are so pure and dirty for 80 euro for a day.

Reviews.Title: “cheap and clean worth wat ur paying”
Reviews.Author: AdnanOmar
Reviews.Content: the place is neet and clean iv been there last month nd people r nice ,,rooms r small but who cares ,,i only used them at night for sleeping ,,but they were clean and the most nice thing in this hotel is the staff who r really plesant except the lobby man,, the food was not that great but still its good for the whole deal ,,i stayed a week,, there is an internet in the lobby nd safe box also in the lobby which is good thing too ,,soo if ur someone who wants to see istanbul nd enjoy the city then go back to sleep i suggest this hotel nd dont believe the reviews about cockroach because the place is really clean ,and for the arab guests [the staff knows arabic this was a plus for me too]

Reviews.Title: “a cheap and clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: semsemaCairo
Reviews.Content: the hotel is in a very good place just few steps fro istklal rode its price is reasonable and it is very clean breakfast is quite good and the staff are friendly

Reviews.Title: “Would win "Worst Hotel Ever Award"”
Reviews.Author: hhelmy
Reviews.Content: Our trip would have been far better if we were in a different hotel Positive Points: - Location near Taksim Square & Istiklal St. Negative: -Provocative, unhelpfull staff -Reception staff get commission from tour companies and shops, so if you ask any general question they will lie and decive you to sell you a tour or send you to a certain restaurant or shop. If you intend to stay there, never take advice from the staff. -Small rooms -No view (shaft!) -Noisy, I could hear several conversations from neighbouring rooms

Reviews.Title: “Heart of the city”
Reviews.Author: sayeid
Reviews.Content: This is near Taksim Square and at the center of city. Good service.

Reviews.Title: “Skanky”
Reviews.Author: fkntourist
Reviews.Content: Cockroaches in the lobby, small and fast ones. Room cleaning could be better, especially the toilets - quite filthy actually. In the lobby thereÂ´s a gray haired man holding court, screaming and staring at people who drinks beer - donÂ´t know if heÂ´s the owner or whoever. Breakfast is bad. Quite skanky this hotel...

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Monopol
HotelInfo.Address: Mesrutiyet caddesi No 93, Istanbul 80050, Turkey
